comment.author: 91105961@N00
comment._content: Warrenpoint & Rostrevor Tramways Company This horse drawn tramway was opened in 1877 and transported visitors between the Warrenpoint Railway Station and The Great Northern Hotel in Rostrevor. It closed down 1915 when a storm washed part of the track away.

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: You can still see tram tracks in this Google Streetview, although the hotel was firebombed long ago...
